title: The root schema
description: The root schema comprises the entire JSON document.

examples.name: Removal of organic carbon by natural bacterioplankton communities as a function of pCO2 from laboratory experiments between 2012 and 2016
examples.description: This dataset includes results of laboratory experiments which measured dissolved organic carbon (DOC) usage by natural bacteria in seawater at different pCO2 levels. Included in this dataset are; bacterial abundance, total organic carbon (TOC), what DOC was added to the experiment, target pCO2 level.
